name: title
description: Book title

name: subtitle
description: Book subtitle

name: author
description: Author or authors of the book

name: date
description: Book publication date

name: abstract
description: Book abstract

name: description
description: Description metadata for HTML version of book

name: chapters
description: Book part and chapter files

name: references
description: Book references file

name: appendices
description: Book appendix files

name: output-file
description: Base name for single-file output (e.g. PDF, ePub)

name: cover-image
description: Cover image (used in HTML and ePub formats)

name: sharing
description:
Sharing buttons to include on navbar or sidebar
(one or more of `twitter`, `facebook`, `linkedin`)

name: downloads
description:
Download buttons for other formats to include on navbar or sidebar
(one or more of `pdf`, `epub`, and `docx)

name: tools
description: Custom tools for navbar or sidebar

name: site-url
description: Base URL for published website

name: site-path
description: Path to site (defaults to '/'). Not required if you specify `site-url`.

name: repo-url
description: Base URL for website source code repository

name: repo-branch
description: Branch of website source code (defaults to `main`)

name: repo-actions
description: Links to source repository actions (`none` or one or more of `edit`, `source`, `issue`)

name: search
description: Site search (`true` or `false` to enable/disable, or provide custom [Search Options](#search)

name: navbar
description: Navbar options (see [Navbar](#navbar))

name: sidebar
description: Sidebar options (see [Sidebar](#sidebar))

name: margin-header
description: Markdown to place above margin content (text or file path)

name: margin-footer
description: Markdown to place below margin content (text or file path)

name: page-navigation
description: Provide next and previous article links in footer

name: page-footer
description: Page footer. Text content or [page footer](#page-footer) definition.

name: image
description: Default site thumbnail image for `twitter` / `open-graph`

name: open-graph
description: Generate Open Graph metadata (see [Open Graph](#open-graph) options)

name: twitter-card
description: Generate Twitter Card metadata (see [Twitter Card](#twitter-card) options)
